mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PORDER_ITEM(PORDER_CODE, MANAGER, ITEM_CODE, PORDER_COUNT, PORDER_PRICE, PORDER_ITEM_PRICE, RECEIVE_DEADLINE, CREATE_IP, CREATE_ID) VALUES ( #{pOrderItem.pOrderCode}, #{pOrderItem.manager}, #{pOrderItem.itemCode}, #{pOrderItem.pOrderCount}, #{pOrderItem.pOrderPrice}, #{pOrderItem.pOrderItemPrice}, #{pOrderItem.receiveDeadline}, #{pOrderItem.createIp}, #{pOrderItem.createId} );
